item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Ridhim, also known as RedstoneGuy online. I’m a 10th-grader in India, passionate about technology. I enjoy crocheting, gaming, and experimenting with linux. I also love cooking, baking, and researching. You can view more about these interests of mine by clicking the interests button in the header.

item.title: History ⏳
item.description: I love history! It’s so fascinating learning about the past, what issues arised and how they were solved. And, as George Santayana said: “Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.” I also enjoy diplomacy and representing countries in MUNs (see here)

item.title: Home Server 🖥️
item.description: I’m running a debian home server with services like Jellyfin, Pi-Hole, QBittorrent, HomeAssistant, and more. It also functions as a print server, turning my wired printer wireless. I also use it to expirement with linux and self host many other services.

item.title: Model United Nations 🌐
item.description: I love model united nations! I’ve represented many countries such as Angola, Mozambique, Zimbabwe, Switzerland, Iran, in MUNs, and have won 2 special mentions till now. I believe MUNs are a wonderful way to make friends, improve speaking skills, and learn more about current affairs.
